titles.title: To direct the Judicial Conference to provide electronic public access to exhibits in Federal cases, and for other purposes.
Open Access to Courts Act of 2019
Open Access to Courts Act of 2019
Open Access to Courts Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary:
Open Access to Courts Act of 2019
This bill establishes a pilot program to provide public online access to exhibits in federal cases.
